    • Field Detail

      • ch_points

        private java.util.List<SimplePoint> ch_points
        The PointList of the ConvexHull. Is ordered clockwise from turning point L to L.(last L not included)

    • Method Detail

      • clearAllLists

        private void clearAllLists(DrawingPanel panel)
        Clears all pointlists. Should be called before calculation.
        Parameters:
        panel - the panel

      • getCHPoints

        public int[][] getCHPoints()
        Returns:
        Returns the ConvexHull Points in an int-Array. arr[i][0] is the x-Coordinate arr[i][1] the y-Coordinate.

      • calculateKonturPolygon

        private void calculateKonturPolygon(DrawingPanel panel)
        Calculates the KonturPolygon.
        Parameters:
        panel - the panel to get the Points

      • sortS

        private java.util.List<SimplePoint> sortS(java.util.List<SimplePoint> unsortedPoints)
        Sorts a given Points list by ascending x-Coordinates, by equaltiy sorts by y-Coordinate
        Parameters:
        unsortedPoints - the unsorted pointlist
        Returns:
        the sorted pointlist

      • sweepToRight

        private void sweepToRight(DrawingPanel panel,
                          java.util.List<SimplePoint> sortedS)
        Sweep to right. Determines the turning points L,U,O and the left side of the KonturPolygon-Points
        Parameters:
        panel - the panel
        sortedS - the sorted pointlist

      • sweepToLeft

        private void sweepToLeft(DrawingPanel panel,
                         java.util.List<SimplePoint> sortedS)
        Sweep to left. Determines the turning point R and the right side of the KonturPolygon-Points
        Parameters:
        panel - the panel
        sortedS - the sorted pointlist

      • drawConvexHull

        private void drawConvexHull(DrawingPanel panel)
        Draws the convex hull.
        Parameters:
        panel - the panel to draw too

      • getConvexHull

        private void getConvexHull()
        Writes the convex-hull-points in the ch_points list.

      • addPointsToList

        private void addPointsToList()
        Writes the convex-hull-points in the ch_points list. Takes care of the right-order and cleans up double points

      • getPartHull

        private java.util.List<SimplePoint> getPartHull(int i,
                                                java.util.List<SimplePoint> part,
                                                SimplePoint last)
        Gets a part of the hull.
        Parameters:
        i - the upcounting index
        part - the part of the KonturPolygon
        last - the last point(turning point) of this part
        Returns:
        the part hull list

      • removePoints

        private int removePoints(int i,
                         int j,
                         java.util.List<SimplePoint> ret)
        Removes the points on the right side of the convexline.
        Parameters:
        i - the upcounting index,i=ancestor i+1=found point i+2=successor
        j - the downcounting index
        ret - the part of the convexhull which will be returned
        Returns:
        the index the algorithm has to start again

      • LRTest

        private long LRTest(SimplePoint A,
                    SimplePoint B,
                    SimplePoint C)
        LR test.
        Parameters:
        A - the first point
        B - the second point
        C - the point which location will be returned
        Returns:
        the result, r<0 => C is on the right r>0 => C is on the left (note that the "realresult" is being inversed because 0,0 is in the top left)
